hushed.name: Hushed
pros: Does not require your SIM number
cons: US and Canadian phone numbers only

google voice.name: Google Voice
pros: One free number (unlimited numbers with Workspace subscription)
No phone app required (forwards calls and texts to your SIM number)
cons: Requires a Google account (which requires a SIM number)

mysudo.name: MySudo
pros: Does not require your SIM number
Includes fully functional email, web browser, and [digital masked cards](/guides/most-important/payments) (iOS only)
cons: US, Canada, and UK phone numbers only
Desktop client in beta, web-based only, can only sync with iOS

tossable digits.name: Tossable Digits
pros: No phone app required (can optionall forward calls and texts to another number)
cons: International calls are billed per minute
SMS only supported on US and Canada Numbers

viber.name: Viber
pros: Does not require your SIM number
cons: Calls are billed by the minute
Only offers one number per user
